chart.title: Annual freshwater withdrawals
chart.subtitle: Annual freshwater withdrawals refer to total water withdrawals, not counting evaporation losses from storage basins, measured in cubic metres (m³) per year. Total water withdrawals are the sum of withdrawals for agriculture, industry and municipal (domestic uses). Withdrawals also include water from desalination plants in countries where they are a significant source.
chart.citation: AQUASTAT - FAO's Global Information System on Water and Agriculture, FAO, via World Bank (2026)
